text: Marius Todericiu (17 June 1970 – 8 August 2019) was a Romanian football goalkeeper and coach who spent the majority of his career in Germany.Weltfussball profile ==References== ==External links== *Marius Todericiu at Sport.de *Marius Todericiu at Fupa.net Category:1970 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Romanian footballers Category:Liga I players Category:SR Brașov players Category:Kickers Offenbach players Category:1.
